questions.question: What is the value of x in the equation 2x + 5 = 13?
questions.explanation: To solve 2x + 5 = 13, subtract 5 from both sides: 2x = 8, then divide by 2: x = 4

questions.question: Which of the following is a prime number?
questions.explanation: 17 is a prime number because it is only divisible by 1 and itself

questions.question: What is the area of a rectangle with length 8 cm and width 5 cm?
questions.explanation: Area of rectangle = length × width = 8 × 5 = 40 cm²

questions.question: What is the circumference of a circle with radius 7 cm? (Use π ≈ 3.14)
What is the slope of the line passing through points (2, 3) and (6, 11)?
What is the volume of a cylinder with radius 3 cm and height 10 cm? (Use π ≈ 3.14)
If log₂(x) = 3, what is the value of x?
What is the derivative of f(x) = 3x² + 2x - 5?
In a right triangle, if one angle is 30° and the hypotenuse is 10 cm, what is the length of the side opposite to the 30° angle?
questions.explanation: In a 30-60-90 triangle, the side opposite to 30° is half the hypotenuse: 10/2 = 5 cm

questions.question: What is the sum of the first 10 terms of the arithmetic sequence: 2, 5, 8, 11, ...?
questions.explanation: First term a = 2, common difference d = 3. Sum = n/2[2a + (n-1)d] = 10/2[2(2) + 9(3)] = 5[4 + 27] = 155

questions.question: If the probability of rain tomorrow is 0.3, what is the probability that it will NOT rain?
questions.explanation: Probability of NOT raining = 1 - Probability of raining = 1 - 0.3 = 0.7

questions.question: What is the median of the data set: 12, 8, 15, 10, 6, 20, 14?
questions.explanation: First arrange in order: 6, 8, 10, 12, 14, 15, 20. The median is the middle value: 12
